content.rendered:
please note: you’ll need to purchase gift cards, x.club memberships or series / packages through a location but not to worry, all of our memberships, gift cards and series/packages are transferable to all other locations in your country! (ie: the canadian gift cards/memberships/series/packages can be redeemed at any canadian location, and the usa gift cards/memberships/series/packages can be redeemed at any of our usa locations.)
